long_description: There's no blow torch required to enjoy this Backpacker's Pantry sweet and satisfying twist on creme brulee. To prepare the creme brulee, simply remove the sugar topping packet and set it aside; add 3/4 cup of cold water to filling mix and beat briskly with 2 forks for 2 min. Sprinkle brulee sugar topping over top of filling, let sit for 10 min. and enjoy. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: There's no blow torch required to enjoy this Backpacker's Pantry sweet and satisfying twist on creme brulee.
